What are some potential use cases for digital signatures on the Verus Network?

Digital signatures on the Verus Network have a wide range of potential use cases. Some examples include: journalists signing content to establish a reputation for authenticity, open source projects digitally signing their binary releases to ensure authenticity, physical entry systems, workflow applications, and new earning opportunities.

For example, using Verus ID signatures, it’s possible for any journalist anywhere to sign photos, videos, and content, establish a reputation for authenticity, and counter the potential for deep-fakes to make the truth harder to find. Open source projects can now create their own identities and digitally sign their binary releases, ensuring that not only can a file be verified by hash as the one downloaded from a particular server, but by signature as the actual file initially signed by the developer or release engineer. Signatures also form the basis for any attestation of one party to the validity of another. In fact, there are so many applications for digital signatures, from things listed already, to physical entry systems, to workflow applications, to new earning opportunities that a full discussion of use cases would overwhelm these release notes.In any case, we are happy to release digital signatures for all, and we hope you enjoy using this new, simple capability, maybe even think of a new use case you’d like to pursue yourself as a business opportunity on the Verus Network!# Verus ID

How can digital signatures be used to counter the potential for deep-fakes?

Digital signatures can be used to counter the potential for deep-fakes by allowing journalists and content creators to sign their work, establishing a reputation for authenticity and making it possible to verify the origin and integrity of the content.

For example, using Verus ID signatures, it’s possible for any journalist anywhere to sign photos, videos, and content, establish a reputation for authenticity, and counter the potential for deep-fakes to make the truth harder to find. What are some potential benefits of using Verus IDs for identity applications?

Some potential benefits of using Verus IDs for identity applications include the ability to establish a reputation for authenticity, verify the origin and integrity of content, and provide a decentralized, self-sovereign identity platform that is not controlled by a corporation.
